verbose_text: Interaction of PD-1 and the immunosuppressive ligand PD-L1 (B7-H1) or PD-L2 (B7-DC) takes place in peripheral tissues and results in a suppression of T-cell activation and thus mediates immune resistance in the tumor microenvironment.
evidence: B7-DC) takes place in peripheral tissues and results in a suppression of T-cell activation and thus mediates immune resistance in the tumor microenvironment
